channel.description: Latest Financial News for NORTHERN DYNASTY MINERALS LTD.

item.title: Northern Dynasty Announces Increase to Bought Deal Offering of Common Shares
item.description: [Marketwired] - Northern Dynasty Minerals Ltd. is pleased to announce that as a result of strong demand, it has increased the size of its previously announced bought deal offering to 17,600,000 common shares of the Company ...
